entity.java.laugh_word: Foolish,Your Command is only a heap of ash
entity.java.death_word: You think you kill me,No,this is only a shadow of me.If you want to find me,come to GITHUB.I'm everywhere.
entity.java.death_word2: Too young too simple,take your mob grinder away!
entity.csharp.laugh_word: Do you want to test if you can /kill me? You should find your mother.
entity.csharp.laugh_word2: Hiding after a machine,where's your d**k?
entity.csharp.death_word: My situation today is not very good……It's only a phantom of me.I'm outside of the world.
